activities: Consumer information is collected when registering products, ordering online and mailing offers/newsletters.  Employee information is collected for business administrative purposes (e.g. payroll, benefits, communication).  Vendor information is collected for business purposes (e.g. invoicing, shipping, communication). Email is centrally stored in U.S. and is designated for business communication per our internal Email Policy.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Slovakia, Spain, Switzerland
industrysector: Consumer Electronics - (CEL)Pleasure Boats & Accessories - (PLB)General Consumer Goods - (GCG)
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association ("AAA") and European data protection authorities (EU DPAs) for European HR data
